Robin | Boston, MA / Remote | Full Time

Robin is a better way to manage meeting rooms. It's a bit like having a search engine (eg. OpenTable) for your office -- you can find and book rooms based on the stuff you need, remove no-show meetings automatically, and get reports on how the office is actually being used. Netflix, Sonos, and KAYAK all use it to power their conference rooms. Weâ€™re looking for engineers that get things done for the following roles:

The interview process consists of a few phone screens and an in-person interview. Job descriptions and applications at https://angel.co/robin/jobs
